alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 7:44PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Apache and Navajo Counties through 815 PM MST... At 743 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Show Low, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Show Low, Wagon Wheel, Linden, Fool Hollow Lake Campground and White Mountain Lake. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 330 and 347. State Route 77 between mile markers 343 and 353. Highway 60 between mile markers 334 and 355. State Route 61 between mile markers 353 and 358. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; White Mountains
